content:
# The inspection of the wooden chest's inventory shows that it is currently empty, which is expected since I have not placed any items into it yet.
# Now that I have a wooden chest, I can store items in it for future use.

# Next, I will transfer some wood from my inventory to the wooden chest to demonstrate how to store items.

# First, I will check my current inventory to confirm the amount of wood I have.
current_inventory = inspect_inventory()
wood_amount = current_inventory.get('wood', 0)

# If I have wood to store, I will transfer some of it to the wooden chest.
if wood_amount > 0:
    transfer_item(wooden_chest_entity, 'wood', quantity=5)  # Transferring 5 wood to the chest
    print(f"Inventory after transfer: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking my inventory after the transfer
    print(f"Chest Inventory after transfer: {inspect_inventory(wooden_chest_entity)}")  # Checking the chest's inventory after the transfer
else:
    print("No wood available to transfer.")  # In case there is no wood to transfer
